actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide the right to counsel to grand jury witnesses in order to better protect the constitutional rights of such witnesses.

summary.text: Provides grand jury witnesses the right to counsel. Authorizes such counsel to disclose, outside the grand jury room, matters which occur before the grand jury while such counsel is present in the grand jury room. (Adds 18 U.S.C. 3329)

titles.title: A bill to provide the right to counsel to grand jury witnesses in order to better protect the constitutional rights of such witnesses.
